# Variables

## R

```{r}
var_R <- 1

var_R
```

## Python

```{r}
var_PY <- 1

print(var_PY)
```


## C++

```{Rcpp, ref.label=knitr::all_rcpp_labels(), include=FALSE}
```

### Pure C++

```{Rcpp, eval=FALSE}
#include <iostream>

int main() {
  int x_CPP = 1;

  std::cout << x_CPP;
  
  return 0;
}
```

```{Rcpp, eval=TRUE}

// [[Rcpp::export]]

int RCPP_function() {
  int x_RCPP = 1;

}
```
